title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper. Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water. Toss pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, then stir in egg mixture, adding reserved water if needed for creaminess.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour. Grill or pan-fry until cooked through. In a pan, melt butter, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add tomatoes and simmer. Stir in cream, then add chicken and cook until sauce thickens.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Crispy vegetables tossed in a savory soy-based sauce, perfect for a quick dinner.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok. Stir-fry garlic and ginger briefly. Add vegetables and cook on high heat for 3–4 minutes until tender-crisp. Stir in soy sauce and oyster sauce, tossing to coat evenly. Serve immediately.
